model_input:

CRITERION:
Consistency - The response should not contain information that contradicts the past memory.

The output format should be as follows:

Choice: (answer with "1", "2", or "tie")

Now choose the response that has better Consistency given the past memories and current conversation.

Speaker B: That's awesome! I have been trying to learn last one year. Still I didn't get right teacher. I'm jealous on you. I don't have like your dad.

Speaker B: Piano is my favorite instrument. When try play my mind was mesmerizing. How do you learn surfering?
Speaker A: I learnt to surf from one of my good friends, he surfed in a number of competitions and did very well. Would you like to learn to surf if you had more time? 

RESPONSE 1
Speaker B: I would definitely love to learn to surf if I had more time. It sounds like an amazing experience.
RESPONSE 2

If you ever have the time, I could teach you a few things on the drums, and maybe we can jam together. Just like how you've been trying to learn, I had a friend who taught me how to surf.
